Trade indicators Chapter 1 Introduction 1.1 List of indicators 1.2 Summary

Trade indicators Author: Riccardo Giubilei Chapter 1 Introduction The following document describes the implementation of 9 trade indicators within the Statistical Working System (SWS) of the Food and Agricultural Organization of the United Nations (FAO). 1.1 List of indicators The list of trade indicators integrated into this process is the following: 1. Import Dependency Ratio. 2. Self-Sufficiency Ratio. 3. Share of Agricultural Exports to GDP. 4. Bilateral Trade Discrepancy index. 5. Agricultural Trade Openness index. 6. Terms of Trade index. 7. Import Market Concentration index. 8. Export Market Concentration index. 9. Revealed Comparative Advantage index. 1.2 Summary The structure of this document is the following. Section 2 describes the indicators from a methodological perspective. Section 3 provides an exhaustive description of input data and other type of input information needed for the plugins. Section 4 illustrates the input and output elements used for this process. Finally, Section 5 describes the \(6\) plugins that implement the indicators.
